Request - Class in ru.jango.j0loader
Class-container for information, needed for loaders to work:
URI of the request destination List<Param> with request parameters (for HTTP POST and GET) HTTP method - basically it is determined automatically, GET is in priority size of the response data in bytes (value of HTTP response 'content-length' header, file size, etc.; -1 if the data size is unknown or unavailable)
Request(URI) - Constructor for class ru.jango.j0loader.Request
Constructs new request with some internal variables.
Request(URI, long) - Constructor for class ru.jango.j0loader.Request
Constructs new request with some internal variables.
Request(URI, List<Param>) - Constructor for class ru.jango.j0loader.Request
Constructs new request with some internal variables.
Request(URI, long, List<Param>) - Constructor for class ru.jango.j0loader.Request
Constructs new request with all internal variables.
Request.Method - Enum in ru.jango.j0loader
 
reset() - Method in class ru.jango.j0loader.DataLoader
Resets the loader to it's initial clear state:
stop operations by DataLoader.stopWorking() clear queue by DataLoader.clearQueue()
reset() - Method in class ru.jango.j0loader.image.ImageLoader
Resets the loader to it's initial clear state:
stop operations by DataLoader.stopWorking() clear queue by DataLoader.clearQueue() clear cache by Cache.clear() clear queue queue by ImageLoader.clearCacheQueue()
